str2: When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The sun, sunlight. From hele; the sun; by implication, light.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make to rise, I rise, shine (generally of the sun, and hence met.). From ana and the base of telos; to arise.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To burn, scorch. From kauma; to burn.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To dry up, parch, be ripened, wither, waste away. From xeros; to desiccate; by implication, to shrivel, to mature.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
A root, shoot, source; that which comes from the root, a descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'root'.
